extendedInfo.description: SpeedView is an advanced speedometer application that uses the phone's built-in GPS system to show your current, maximum and average speed, as well as the direction, total distance, and time traveled. Suitable for running, car driving, biking, or hiking.â¢ High accuracyGPS-based speedometer that is more accurate than the one in your car.â¢ Linear compassShows your current direction of travel. A compass mode is also available.â¢ HUD modeMirrors the numbers so you can place your phone on your car's dashboard and see the speed reflected in the front glass. You can check out this video to see how it works: http://youtu.be/rzda7CQ-ZAUâ¢ Speed graphDisplays a graph chart covering the last several minutes.â¢ Speed warningYou can set the speed limits for three different types of roads so that when you go too fast a visual alert or sound will notify you.â¢ Display unitsSupports units such as miles, kilometers, and nautical miles.â¢ GPX track exportEnables you to save your current track to the SD card or email it to someone. The GPX format is supported by Google Earth and many other programs: http://www.topografix.com/gpx_resources.aspâ¢ Background modeYou can minimize the program and keep it running in the background. It will work as usual and even notify you when you exceed the speed limit.Please note that the accuracy of GPS measurements is affected by a number of factors including atmospheric conditions, obstructions and the visibility of satellites.If you have any questions or comments, feel free to post them on our blog: http://blog.codesector.com/

reviews.title: Really like exporting GPS paths
reviews.comment: I\'ve driven, but wish it was easier to do
reviews.author: Jeff Parks

reviews.title: Awesome app.
reviews.comment: Been using it for a couple years now. My old car had a broken speedometer and I had to use this so I didn\'t get pulled over everyday. I love the new Widget. Helps it not take as much battery life. Well worth the upgrade to pro!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t find GPS data
reviews.comment: The free version works great. The pro version does not read the GPS data and is currently useless. All my other GPS programs work as well. emailed Dev\'r. Update: developer want sure what problem was, however i found that if recording is stopped then no data is collected. So if you want to see your speed but not record then this app is not for you. Currently only works when recording is on. Up 1 star to 4 stars.
reviews.author: ed ed

reviews.title: Brilliant...
reviews.comment: Best android GPS datalogger on the market. Accurate and easy to use, what more can i say.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use it for my bike setup!
reviews.comment: Perfect app for displaying speed and elevation while on my bike. Has some really awesome features!! Love it!
reviews.author: Charlie Gaziano

reviews.comment: Very good program
reviews.author: Roger Denny

reviews.title: Best Auto App Out
reviews.comment: (Update*** THIS APP DOESNT WORK ON MY NEXUS 7 WHICH BRINGS THE RATING DOWN A STAR. IF IT WASNT SUCH A GREAT APP ON MY PHONE, IT WOULD GET 1 STAR! FIX FOR TABLETS AND WERE BACK TO 5 STARS)  I love this app. My car is a JDM Subaru STi Type-R, and it only has km, so Speed View helps me with mph, plus I use the 1/4mi and 0-60 setting all the time! Lol.. and the HUD setting gives my car an extra WoW factor, as if RHD isn\'t enough!
reviews.author: Weldon Miguel Rodriguez

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Nexus 7?
reviews.comment: Says it wont run on tablets. It would be nice to have that in the description since it still lets you install it.
reviews.author: Kenton Appanaitis

reviews.title: Very accurate
reviews.comment: Bought this more for the altimeter when hiking, but have to say the speedometer is insanely accurate. Just drove from boulder to Vail and it was right on the whole time. At the top of Vail pass the elevation is listed at 10,662ft and the altimeter read 10,632ft so only about 30ft off which ain\'t no thang to me. Would be sweet if on the hybrid screen you had the option to make one of the selectable tiles larger so you can actually see it while the phones on your dashboard. Also would be sweet if you could add GPS based weather an option for those selectable tiles as well. Do this and its a 5 star app all day
reviews.author: Ryne Wilson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I drive a crappy Chevy Cavalier and whenever is hot outside, none of my gauges work. I used the app, gps speedometer before this one and it was just not user friendly. I just got the Samsung Galaxy S4 and found this app to work flawlessly. The speed increments move smoothly like an actual speedometer and the compass moves like it\'s in fluid. I use this app to keep me out of trouble and an upgrade to not see ads is only .99c.
reviews.author: Mark Lein

reviews.title: Tablet support
reviews.comment: Bad scaling... The speedometer is tiny.
reviews.author: Lucien Foss

reviews.title: Above Excellent!!!!
reviews.comment: Well worth the money!!!!!
reviews.author: William Ballard

reviews.title: Problem in installation
reviews.comment: After purchase it is not being installed in Nexus. Package is not valid As it reply after dowloading.
reviews.author: Sanjay Kumar

reviews.title: Not for tablet?
reviews.comment: This app is not for tablets! I want my money back!
reviews.author: Bartosz Chmura

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.comment: I love this app for its simplistic take on ui

reviews.comment: Slick interface, pretty accurate...

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Nexus. This is crap.

reviews.title: Great!

reviews.title: Won\'t work on nexus 7.
reviews.comment: Says tablets are not supported but behind the popup the app seems to work fine. Would give negative stars if I could!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works like a charm. Needed some help from the developer with a setting, and got an email response within an hour!!!  5 stars.
